poem:
Title: "Voices in the Wind"

Echoing shriek, sound bites 
Through silicon light, 
Where sing the steel birds,
Their wrath ignited in flight.

Her voice - a single star,
Caught in the web's vast night,
Bearing witnessed horror,
To end a weary fight.

The world binds over,
Through a hashtag's might,
While the blood of children 
Feeds the earth in spite. 

Can humanity's chorus,
Sever its dark rite?
